thread.section_title: Ties.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ties.com | www.ties.com
thread.title: Adrian Pearson

author: Adrian Pearson
title: Adrian Pearson
text:
Was directed to Tie.com through another website (primermagazine.com, must read for any guy from 18-30), overall had a fantastic experience. I was able to get 9 ties, a tie rack, and tie bar for under 40 bucks, after a slight misunderstanding with a promo code I had. Theyhave a great selection and customer service was prompt and friendly. Definitely
my new go-to store for ties and accessories.
